import React from "react"; import { Box, Stack, Typography, Card, CardContent, Divider } from "@mui/material"; export default function About() { return ( KIKOFF KIKOFF is a lightweight NFL schedule & matchup viewer. Browse games by week, tap a matchup, and see a quick, transparent estimate of the home team’s win probability based on recent results. Privacy & Data • The developer does not collect, store, sell, or share personal data. • The app fetches public NFL info from BallDon’tLie NFL. Requests go directly from your browser to the provider. • Any API keys you add are used only to call the provider and aren’t stored by the developer. How the Win Probability Works KIKOFF computes a simple estimate for the home team’s win chance using past completed games:
  • Pull recent finals from current & previous season (BallDon’tLie /games, free tier).
  • Compute team averages: points per game (PPG) and points allowed (OPPG).
  • Expected margin ≈ (Home PPG − Away OPPG) − (Away PPG − Home OPPG) + ~2 pts home edge.
  • Convert margin → probability with a logistic curve (~7 pts ≈ 70%).
 If no recent finals exist yet, it falls back to a small home field edge until results arrive. ); }
